title: Retro Phone History
description: Rotary phones, party lines, phone booths, and operators

questions.question: On a rotary phone, how did you dial a number?
options: Speak the number to an operator
Crank a handle on the side
Turn a dial with finger holes for each digit

questions.question: What was a 'party line' in telephone history?
options: A special line for conference calls
A phone number for reaching party planners
A shared telephone line used by multiple households
